name: pokerth-tsv
short_description:
This project aims to generate a more details comparison page between all the opponents of the same table instead of the page proposed by default on the website http://www.poker-heroes.com.

The release is a zip file with a readme, the java archive and finally a result sample. 

Please start by reading the readme and if you follow the steps properly you should get the same kind of result as the result sample.

The main steps are:

* Install a Java Runtime Environment 8 if needed 
* Double click on pokerth-tsv-1.4.1.jar, it will launch a simple UI.
* Replace in the text field the url of the page that generate the stats of the table on the site http://www.poker-heroes.com which is something like http://pokerth.net/redirect_user_profile.php?tableview=1&nick1=val1&nick2=val2&table=val11

A file should be generated that you can open with your favorite navigator manually or by clicking on the result status.
